(:action drink ; Consume a liquid resource to satisfy a need
 :parameters (?npc - person ?liquid_source - liquid)
 :precondition (and (needs_hydration ?npc) (contains_drinkable ?liquid_source))
 :effect (and (not (needs_hydration ?npc))

(:action collect ; Collect a resource and update the status of the container
  :parameters (?npc - person ?resource - object ?container - container)
  :precondition (and (available ?npc) (collectible ?resource) (empty ?container))
  :effect (and (contains ?container ?resource) (not (empty ?container))
